tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Ellen's Got Hunks!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: To celebrate Hunk Week, we cut together some of the hunkiest moments from the show. Enjoy!

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: holy crap that girl with channing﻿ tatum.... hahahahahahaaha
LOVED every minute of﻿ this video!!!!
xD ﻿
Even gayer!﻿
this makes me wanna﻿ pee :P
hey that aint nice, and even if it were a guy, y would it matter> just respect others and thier choices, please﻿
@Laken2016 yeah I was just kidding anyways... you know that "dayum nigga,﻿ you gay" is an internet meme right ?!
i'm﻿ a girl...
But Ellen's﻿ a lesbian... wheres all the babes... :(
what episode was﻿ 0:11?? plz tell me?
oh﻿ my gosh, Betty White XD
Dayum Nigga,﻿ You gay!

for those looking for the 0:11
shemar﻿ moore gets hot and heavy
shamar moore and mario <3 0:11 ﻿
that kiss...i think im pregnant.﻿
i wanna﻿ be a guest on that show lol
hahaha me to ! ﻿

Frankie says relax. I was just kidding, how silly is it that centuries us men judge women by their aesthetics and treated as such, but when the roles are reversed﻿ the reaction is different? Unbunch your panties and move along dear :)
omg itz﻿ ellen
nice﻿ bulge...
who﻿ wants magic mike strippers?
second﻿ gayest talk show on television
wow this show is so sexist, men are not a piece of meat. You cant just undress us you﻿ perverted fucks.
Ellen becomes﻿ straight for 1 minute and 17 seconds.
So I suppose undressing women is completely fine then? Because there is a lot of﻿ that in the world and I'm surprised that you'd be alarmed at this.

Reviewer.Books: Bible. Anything by Neil Gaiman and Marcus Zusak but pretty much many others too.
